text_en: Before learning Braille, the children have to train the tactile senses.
text_sw: Kabla ya kujifunza nukta nundu, watoto wanapaswa kujifunza mtembeo wa mikono wa kugusa.

text_en: Then it´s time to learn that a letter consists of 6 points.
text_sw: Kisha, ni wakati wa kujifunza kwamba herufi inaundwa na nukta 6.

text_en: Training with print Braille letters is important.
text_sw: Kujifunza kutumia herufi za mashine ya nuktanundu ni muhimu.

text_en: Next step can be to create letters on a slate.
text_sw: Hatua inayofuata inaweza kuwa kuunda herufi kwenye ubao.

text_en: When learning to read Braille, it´s good to have an experienced teacher.
text_sw: Unapojifunza kutumia mashine ya Breli, ni vizuri kuwa na mwalimu mzoefu.

text_en: Perkins Braille-machine is an important tool to master.
text_sw: Mashine ya nuktanundu ya Perkins ni kifaa muhimu kukifahamu vizuri.

text_en: It´s nice to have a peer to tell what is written on the blackboard.
text_sw: Ni vizuri kuwa na rafiki rika akueleze kilichoandikwa ubaoni.
